idea-plugin.name: CalendarClock
idea-plugin.description: This plugin provides tools for working with timestamps and date-time conversions, along with a visual clock display. Key features include: - Convert timestamps to human-readable date-time formats. - Convert date-time formats back to timestamps. - A real-time visual clock for enhanced time tracking.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Initial release with the following features:

  • Timestamp to date-time conversion.
  • Date-time to timestamp conversion.
  • Real-time visual clock display.
